ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: It is a society for the welfare of the poor and needy peoples of the community. Since from its foundation we are working in the field like to promote health services,Cultural Activities, Animal Welfare, drinking water, and Women welfare, which are the problems of our area. Our services are for the poor and needy peoples of the community. We became operational through community organizing themselves for action for the common causes. Our programmes are conducted by mobilizing our mostly domestic and local resources. There is a continuing need for effective , ethical, committed and sustained community organization for improve the sustain of the poorest and most disadvantaged people from Maharashtra state. Our NGO is driven by values that reflect a desire to improve lives, contain elements of voluntarism, have self governance, have clearly stated and definable public purpose to which we hold accountable, formally constituted in law and have identity in tradition of the country, and not for anyoneâ€™s profit. As a our social responsibility, we had conducted various programmes as per needs of our local area. These programmes are-1. Health camps in rural area, 2. Rural Hospital, 3. Shelter house for Animals, 4. Women & Shild welfare and 5. Cultural Activities for sustenance of the rural.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: 1.Eradication of Child Labour 2.Developing livelihood access to marginalized women 3.Enhancing access to drinking water 4.Enhancing access to water resources Enhancing access to water resources 5.Earthquake relief and rehabilitation PIRD ACHIEVEMENTS 1) 800-odd child labourers have given up child labour and have accessed formal school education due to various PIRD campaigns. 2) 60 non-formal education centres, promoted across 60 villages by PIRD, have benefited more than 10,000-odd children. 3) 608 destitute women have organised themselves in 65 SHGs, out of which 252 women have started income generation activities at micro level because of PIRD efforts. 4) As part of the multi-dimensional development programme across 51 villages, drinking water problem was resolved in 20 villages and 300 hectares of non-irrigated land belonging to marginal farmers was brought under irrigation. 5) Till date, 2,221 hectares of land has benefited due to watershed development and natural resource management work done by PIRD. 6) During the 1993 Latur earthquake, PIRD agitated for housing rights of destitute women and in the process, ensured allocation of residential plots to 800 destitute women by government during earthquake rehabilitation.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: PBMAâ€™S H. V. Desai Eye Hospital is a project of Poona Blind Menâ€™s Association. It is a center committed to socio economic rehabilitation of blind since last 60 years. PBMAâ€™S H. V. Desai Eye Hospital was established in year. So far we have examined 30.99 lacs cases and operated 4.38 lacs cases. Majority of these patients 60% are treated absolutely free and rest are charged nominal charges. It has always been our endeavor to ensure that we keep pace with advance in equipment and techniques so that we provide best service. These patients not only have good quality of vision but also have a gainful employment. a) Provide comprehensive quality eye care without discrimination, between free and payment Cases. b) Reach out program in the area up to 350 km from hospital. c) To provide free treatment to more than 60 % cases. d) To impart postgraduate and paramedical training. e) Research center to promote research projects. f) To develop super specialty services in Cornea, Vitreo Retina, Medical Retina, Glaucoma & Pediatric Ophthalmology, Oculoplasty and Low Vision. g) To develop Ocular Surface Management Institute h) To develop Community Ophthalmology Institute The hospital has the following facilities: ïƒ¼ 200 Indoor beds ïƒ¼ 10 Private rooms. ïƒ¼ 2 Private wards. ïƒ¼ Private OPD for paying patients. ïƒ¼ Separate OPDS for free and paying patients as well as specialty OPDS. ïƒ¼ Medical Retina Units with double frequency Yag Laser, AB Scan, Fundus Camera (Digital) with FA facilities. ïƒ¼ Glaucoma screening unit with automated perimeter and Heidelberg HRT 11 ïƒ¼ Community Ophthalmology Institute. ïƒ¼ Strabismus & Pediatric Ophthalmology. ïƒ¼ Cornea and EYE banking services ïƒ¼ Oculoplasty service ïƒ¼ Low Vision Clinic. ïƒ¼ Pathology Lab services The hospital has expertise of performing topical (no injection, no pad, no suture) small incision surgery and Phaco surgery with non-foldable and foldable lens. We are also conducting squint correction, glaucoma surgery, pediatric cataract and oculoplasty surgeries including vitreoretina, keratoplasty. We also have facility to treat Diabetic Retinopathy & Retinopathy of prematurity (ROP). We are also into rehabilitation of the blind, along with an old age home.
